+--------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| *RoadMap*    | *Project*                                                      | *Progress*     | *Leader*                                      | *Tips*                        | *Technology Stack*                                  |
+==============+================================================================+================+===============================================+===============================+=====================================================+
|              | `HydroRollCore`_                                               | |In Progress1| | HsiangNianian                                 | 水系核心                      | ``Rusk`` ``Python`` ``pyo3`` ``Cpython``            |
+ Standards    +----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|  with        | `infini`_                                                      | |In Progress7| | `苏向夜`_                                     | 轻量的文本输入输出流框架      | ``Python``                                          |
+ Distribution +----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|              | `ipm`_                                                         | |In Progress7| | 苏向夜                                        | infini 包管理器               | ``Python``                                          |
+              +----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|              | `ipm-server`_                                                  | |In Progress7| | HsiangNianian                                 | ipm 官方镜像服务器            | ``Python`` ``TypeScript`` ``Vue``                   |
+--------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| Downstream   | `oneroll`_                                                     | |In Progress1| | HsiangNianian                                 | 骰点表达式解析库              | ``Python`` ``Rust`` ``AST``                         |
+  ecology     +----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|              | `HydroRoll`_                                                   | |In Progress2| | HsiangNianian                                 | 骰系插件                      | ``Rust`` ``Python`` ``Vue`` ``Pyo3`` ``Cpython``    |
+ example      +----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|  reference   | `nivis-python`_                                                | |todo|         | HsiangNianian                                 | 水系窗口CLI语言, reply 加载器 | ``Rust`` ``Python`` ``Sphinx`` ``Pyo3``             |
+--------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :Others:     | `lib.rules.coc`_                                               | |todo|         | HsiangNianian                                 | 水系内置 coc 规则包           | ``Python`` ``LaTeX``                                |
+   resource   +----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|              | `lib.rules.thepool`_ [#]_                                      | |todo|         | HsiangNianian , `James V. West`_              | 水系内置规则包                |  ``Python`` ``LaTeX``                               |
+   site       +----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|              | `official-site`_                                               | |In Progress4| | HsiangNianian, `白咕咕`_                      | 水系官网                      | ``Vue`` ``TypeScript``                              |
+   package    +----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|              | `logshader`_                                                   | |In Progress1| | HsiangNianian                                 | 水系跑团日志着色器            |  ``Vue`` ``TypeScript`` ``Python``                  |
+--------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+----------------+-----------------------------------------------+-------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
